verses.text: PEA folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, To‘o mai ha tohi‘anga lahi, ‘o tohi ai ha tohi nima tavale, ‘o pehē, mo‘o Meha-sala-hase-pase.
Pea te u ma‘u mai ‘ani fakamo‘oni ‘oku ala falala ki ai, ‘a ‘Ūlaia ko e taula‘eiki, pea mo Sākalaia ko e foha ‘o Sipelikaia.
Pea u ‘unu‘unu ki he palōfita fefine, pea ne feitama, ‘o ne fā‘ele‘i ha tama tangata. Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kiate au, Fakahingoa ko Meha-sala-hase-pase:
he te‘eki ke poto ‘a e tamasi‘i ke lau, “‘Eku tamai,” “‘Eku fa‘ē,” ‘e fetuku ‘a e koloa ‘o Tāmasikusi mo e vete ‘o Samēlia ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e Tu‘i ‘Āsilia.
Pea fai atu ‘e Sihova ‘ene folofola kiate au, ‘o ne toe pehē,
Ko e me‘a ‘i he fakafisi‘i ‘e he kakai ni ‘a Vai Sailoame, ‘a ia ‘oku tafetafemālie, ka ko hono fiefia‘anga ‘a Lēsini mo e foha ‘o Lemalaia;

pea ko ia vakai, ko ‘Ātonai ē ‘oku ne ‘omi ke lōmaki‘i kinautolu ‘a e vai ‘o e Vaitafe, ‘a e vai kāfakafa mo lahi, ‘a e Tu‘i ‘Āsilia mo hono fu‘u lāngilangi. Pea te ne fakafonu hono ngaahi manga kotoa, pea te ne hake ‘i hono ngaahi kauvai kotoa.
Pea te ne mōia atu ki Siuta; lōmekina mo tafe atu, kae‘oua ke a‘u ki he kia; pea ai ha mafola ki hē mo ē, hangē ha ongo kapakau ‘o fonu ai ‘a e māukupu ‘o ho fonua, ‘Imānuela ē.
Mou fakapaupau‘u mai, ‘a e ngaahi kakai na, Ka mou lailai; Pea fokotu‘u telinga mai ‘a e nofo mama‘o ‘i māmani ‘Ai mahafu, Ka mou lailai; ‘Ai mahafu Ka mou lailai;
Kumi fale‘i, Kae iku noa; Fai ‘a e folofola, Kae ‘ikai tu‘u: He ‘oku ‘iate kimautolu ‘a e ‘Otua.
He na‘e folofola pehē ‘a Sihova kiate au, ‘o falala mamafa ‘a e Nima; ‘o ne akonaki‘i au ke ‘oua na‘a ku fou ‘i he hala ‘oku fou ai ‘a e kakai ni, he‘ene pehē,
‘E ‘ikai te mou lau ko e lavaki ‘a e me‘a kotoa ‘oku ui ‘e he kakai ni ko e lavaki; pea ko e me‘a ‘oku nau manavahē ki ai, ‘e ‘ikai te mou manavahē ki ai,
pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou mate ilifia ki ai, Ko Sihova Sāpaoti, ko ia ia te mou tāpuhaa‘i, pea ko ia ia homou manavahē‘anga, pea ko ia ia homou ilifia‘anga.
Pea te ne hoko ko e fale tapu; ka ko e maka tūkia‘anga, pea ko e makatu‘u ke nau pā atu ki ai ‘o humu, ki he ongo fale ‘Isileli fakatou‘osi; ko e hele mo e helepuna ki he nofo Selusalema.
Pea ‘e humu hanau tokolahi, ‘o tō, pea te nau lailai, pea ‘e touia kinautolu ‘o ma‘u.
Nono‘o mu‘a ‘a e tākitala, sila‘i ‘a e akonaki ‘i he‘eku kau ako.
Ka u tatali ‘e au kia Sihova, ‘a ia ‘oku ne fufū hono fofonga mei he fale ‘o Sēkope, ‘o u fakatu‘a kiate ia.
Vakai, ko au eni mo e fānau kuo foaki mai ‘e Sihova mo‘o faka‘ilonga pea mo‘o taipe ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o ‘Isileli–meia Sihova Sāpaoti ‘oku ‘afio ‘i Mo‘unga Saione.

Pea kapau te nau pehē kiate kimoutolu, Mou huhū ki he kau fakahā‘ele fa‘ahikehe mo e kau tuki fakatēvolo, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fakalea hake mei he kelekele, mo fanafana fakalilolilo mai–‘Ā, ‘ikai na‘e mei huhū ha kakai ki honau ‘Otua? Ko e pehē koā ke huhū ki ha kau mate koe‘uhi ko ha kau mo‘ui!
“Fai ki ha lao mo e fakamo‘oni.” Kapau ‘oku ‘ikai te nau lea hangē ko e me‘a ko ē, tā ko e fa‘ahinga ia ‘e ‘ikai ha‘anau pongipongi hake.
Pea te ne ‘alu holo ‘i he fonua kuo mafasia, mo fiekaia; Pea ‘i he ‘iloange ‘oku ‘alefa, ‘Oku ne tekelili, Pea te ne kape ‘i he huafa ‘o e tu‘i pea mo hono ‘Otua, ‘O ne hanga ki ‘olunga.
Pea ‘oku ne fakasio ki he fonua; Pea tā ko e faingata‘a pē mo e fakapo‘uli: Kuo pūlou ia ‘e he mamahi; Kuo kapusi ki he po‘uli ‘o e po‘uli.
